storyInfo: One day, Texas is assigned to deliver a shipment to a concert hall. However, after Texas arrives at the designated location, she soon discovers that the 'goods' to be delivered is actually a person...

attributes.content: ...Just who are you, anyway?
attributes.name: Gang Member

attributes.content: Penguin Logistics.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So you're with that logistics company everyone's been buzzing about, the one that's got connections on both sides of the law.
attributes.name: Gang Member

attributes.content: If you don't want to end up like your buddy lying over there, then get lost.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The dai lo won't let you get away with this.
attributes.name: Gang Member

attributes.content: He can get in line behind everyone else coming after me. Tell your dai lo he'd better hurry up.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Gang Member

attributes.content: Place is cleaned up.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The goods oughta be in the trunk of that car.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: What are the goods anyway? You still haven't told me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: And who's the client?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: And most importantly, where is the stuff going?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Client's Monster Siren Records.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: We're haulin' some stuff for a concert tonight.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Got it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: As for what the stuff is—
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Texas, I been thinkin'...
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Whenever you say that, nothing good comes of it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Look, we runnin' a company now, and the most important thing for a company is its corporate culture.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Corporate culture?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yeah, we gonna build our own corporate culture, startin' today.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: And today's keyword is—mystery.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You mean, we're building this thing day-by-day?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Never mind.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: By now, Texas has become somewhat used to the Emperor's unpredictability.
She shrugs, opens the trunk of the car, and freezes for a moment.
There's a girl inside, bound tightly with rope, her mouth taped shut. But that isn't what makes Texas freeze—after all, she's seen this scene plenty of times before.
No, it's because she recognizes the girl.
It's Sora, the pop idol who's become viral lately. Texas likes to listen to her songs when she drives.
As soon as Sora sees Texas, she gives a pleading look and begins to struggle.
*muffled screams*!!!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Settle down.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Agh! Look at my outfit! It's all wrinkled.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: *huff* Yeah, maybe I shouldn't be worrying about that right now.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Are you here to rescue me, or kill me?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Neither.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm here to make a delivery.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Then you must be Texas, from Penguin Logistics, right?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You know me?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: This delivery job was actually something I convinced my manager to give you.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You knew you'd be kidnapped?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yeah. There are some people who don't want me performing. They hired a gang to kidnap me.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I happened to overhear their conversation.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh, right, I forgot to introduce myself. I'm Sora, an idol signed to Monster Siren Records.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I have your CD in my car.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh?! You're a fan?!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I have lots of your CDs, actually.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Thanks for your support!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Can you move?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'll give you a lift to the concert hall.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Wait a minute. If I told you to take me somewhere else, would you?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: My job is to deliver the goods, that's you, to the concert hall.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But you can tell me first.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Gimme a second.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Mic test, one two one two.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Can you feel the Arts?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Looks like the kidnappers really did break my mic.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Could you take me to a music store to get it fixed first?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I thought you would want me to take you somewhere safe.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm an idol. I have a responsibility to my fans.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Besides, tonight's concert is very important. If I mess it up, the company will be pissed.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Does it matter?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Does it not?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Over there. She should be over here. Surround the area!
attributes.name: Voice from Far Away

attributes.content: Tell me where the music store is.
attributes.name: Texas (in the car)

attributes.content: Will you take me there?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: The boss said the word of the day is 'mystery'. We're building a corporate culture, you know.
attributes.name: Texas (in the car)

attributes.content: So winging it seems pretty fitting for 'mystery' right now.
attributes.name: Texas (in the car)

attributes.content: Texas, I saw the CDs in your car. You haven't bought my 'sleep aid' series, have you?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I saw it in the store, but I haven't bought it yet.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I sleep just fine.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: And besides, I probably don't need sleep aids when I'm driving.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: That's true.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But I still highly recommend my sleep aid series.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You can give it to your insomniac friends!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Looks like you're pretty proud of those.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm proud of all my music!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I guarantee the sleep aid series will have you snoozing on your pillow!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Unless, of course, you cover your ears. Then it may not be as effective.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Next time I can't sleep, I'll give it a try.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh, right. We should exchange contact info.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'll just send you one for free.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Compliments of rescuing me from the gang's evil clutches.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm the one who should be thanking you.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Alright. We're here.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Give me a sec. I'll be out in real quick.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I found her! She's over here!
attributes.name: Gang Member A

attributes.content: Get her! Be careful! She's a tricky one!
attributes.name: Gang Member B

attributes.content: *sigh* They never learn, do they?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Allow me.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Cover your ears, Texas!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Texas knows what's coming. She quickly covers her ears.
She sees Sora hop onto an adjacent balcony from the second floor of the music store and begins singing into her microphone.
Kill that gir.... huh? I feel... funny.
attributes.name: Gang Member A

attributes.content: My eyes are so heavy...
attributes.name: Gang Member B

attributes.content: What a nice song. I feel... sleepy... g'night... zzzzzz
attributes.name: Gang Member C

attributes.content: After Sora starts singing, the gangsters fall to the floor and drift off into a deep sleep.
Texas feels relieved, but quickly realizes it's because of Sora's singing.
...Something's not right.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: One time, when I was little, I got really annoyed and sang at the top of my lungs. Somehow, all the kids who heard me got angry too...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That's when I knew my singing could 'influence' people.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: If I have a strong thought in my mind and don't try to suppress it, it comes out in my song, and I can't guarantee who it might affect.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Sorry, Texas.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I know you're very capable, which is why I had to lead you to believe...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That you could block my song by covering your ears.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Of course, that's not true.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Wh-Why did you?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So I could get away from all of this.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'm so sorry.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You should apologize... to yourself.
After all, you've just sealed your own fate.
Huh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: How are you—
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Your Arts are unique.
attributes.name: Sinister Gang Member

attributes.content: All it took was a little bit of digging to find that out.
attributes.name: Sinister Gang Member

attributes.content: But those idiots thought dealing with a 'little singer' would be easy. Now I can swoop in and get all the credit.
attributes.name: Sinister Gang Member

attributes.content: This crossbow ain't a toy, missy. If you don't wanna die, I suggest you stay put.
attributes.name: Sinister Gang Member

attributes.content: But there's no need to be scared. The higher-ups want you alive.
attributes.name: Sinister Gang Member

attributes.content: And I have to thank you too. That Texas from Penguin Logistics has been making a real name for herself lately. I don't think I could've taken her alone.
attributes.name: Sinister Gang Member

attributes.content: 'Get away from all of this.' Ha!
attributes.name: Sinister Gang Member

attributes.content: You privileged kids really do have some funny ideas, that's for sure.
attributes.name: Sinister Gang Member

attributes.content: You don't get it.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You're right. I don't. You've got such a great life, singing and dancing for money, and getting all that attention.
attributes.name: Sinister Gang Member

attributes.content: And yet, you want to throw that life away, by the hands of a gangster no less.
attributes.name: Sinister Gang Member

attributes.content: I'd start regretting if I were you.
attributes.name: Sinister Gang Member

attributes.content: I'm stupid... I admit it.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: From the start, I kept imagining all the ways I might fail, but I guess I underestimated you and ended up giving away my only chance of being saved.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: The reason I failed is kinda funny, even to me.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But... if 'a good life' means singing the songs you're told, saying the words you're given, following the set schedule, and smiling on command every single day...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I rather throw it away.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And the only thing I regret now is not having prepared better.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But for trying to escape this life? I have no regrets.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You're bold, I'll give you that.
attributes.name: Sinister Gang Member

attributes.content: Don't worry. You'll get what you wish for.
attributes.name: Sinister Gang Member

attributes.content: That's not up to you.
What?!
attributes.name: Sinister Gang Member

attributes.content: Guh—
attributes.name: Sinister Gang Member

attributes.content: Texas, you—
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: This isn't the best place for a chat.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: This should be far enough.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Texas...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Your lullaby really is something.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I almost didn't wake up.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You're the first person who's ever woken up that quickly.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I used to always be alert, paying attention to everything around me. I guess it's become a habit now.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Sorry, Texas.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You already apologized.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Could you be a little angrier? Otherwise, I feel kinda bad...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You have no regrets, and so, I have no reason to be angry.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Ah, haha, you heard me say that.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And I don't think there's anything wrong with it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You don't like your current life and want to get away from it. There's really nothing wrong with that.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But like you said, next time you should prepare better.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: *sigh* If someone had told me what you just did, maybe I would have changed my mind.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Really? But I was encouraging you to escape.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You don't get it.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Sometimes, just having someone who understands can stop you from doing something reckless.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: If I had met you earlier, I could've opened up to you about all the things that were bothering me.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And maybe you would've comforted me, talked smack with me about the people who were bad to me.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'm not one for talking smack, but I could just smack them for you.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Well then I would have stopped you. I'm against violence!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: We might have differing philosophies, but at least now I have someone to talk to.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Actually, this is exactly what I've been looking for.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: If I had a friend like you in the beginning, I would never have done this.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It's getting late.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But before I leave, could you put on a show with me?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I don't know how.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'll do the singing. You just need to ask the questions.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And you'll know which questions to ask.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Sora walks under a streetlight and holds up her microphone. She extends her hand to Texas and invites her to come forward.
There once was a girl who lived in a high-rise in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Left alone in her big, empty home, she learned how to sing from the idols on TV.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: From morning to night, from dusk to dawn...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Music was her only friend.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Texas knows her songs from listening to them while she drives. She always thought they were nice.
However, at this moment, as Texas listens to Sora's singing, she hears not just the usual beauty in her voice, but also the vitality.
That forceful, explosive vitality.
She feels compelled to start speaking.
What about her parents?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Her father is a businessman. Her mother is a C-list celebrity.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Their marriage was a spur-of-the-moment decision, and their careers are both so demanding.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: How could they have room to love that which was born, unexpectedly, from impulse?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Did she start singing because she was lonely?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: At first, she sang to express her loneliness.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Later, she learned to express more emotions through song.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Singing isn't her crutch, it's her companion.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: How did she become an idol?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: She didn't want to sing to an empty room.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She wanted people to hear her songs...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: So she left her home and went to the garden downstairs.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: The neighbor's kids were playing. She stood in between them and started singing.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Her singing attracted other children, as well as their parents.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That's how she was discovered.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Did she want to be a pop idol?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Everyone was so happy.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Her parents no longer needed to worry about their daughter's future. They had one less burden.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And Monster Siren Records had a new star.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: The girl was also very happy, at the time.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She loved singing to her bones.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She wanted more people to hear her songs.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But things didn't always go her way.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yes! Yes!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Thank you, everyone, for coming to my show!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'll be bringing you all even more amazing performances in the future. Please continue to support me!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'm very happy to meet you all. I hope you can come to my next show!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: This is the script she has to repeat every time.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She has more she wants to say.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She has more songs she wants to sing.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Why didn't she tell that to the person around her?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: She already told them, but it didn't do any good.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: They all told her, 'That's the price you pay for being an idol.'
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She doesn't hate them. They love her and care for her.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But she also does hate them, because they've never really cared about her feelings.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: They only treat her well because—
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She is following the path they chose for her.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: So she decided to run away.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: When she told her manager, her manager said it was common in the industry.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That's when she decided...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She might as well disappear.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But she loves the stage.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: It lets more people hear her songs.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She loves the attention.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: She just wants to be heard.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What are her true hopes and dreams?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: She's only ever had one true dream—
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: To be able to sing...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: as a free soul...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Without a care in the world!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: The riverwalk is empty.
Her only audience is the bright moon, the cool breeze, and Texas.
But Sora has a huge smile on her face.
Thank you, Texas
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: For helping me fulfill my wish.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Take me to the concert, please.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: No, I'm gonna take you back to the Penguin Logistics office.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: This...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yes. The Penguin Logistics office.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I have other orders to deliver.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You can stay here for as long as you like.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Is this gonna be a problem for you with Monster Siren Records?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yeah, but it's not a big deal.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Why... did you help me?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Last year, I decided to leave Columbia, but I didn't know where to go.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Back then, someone took me to Lungmen, to this very room.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: They told me I could stay here for as long as I liked.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: And then you just stayed?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And then, we founded Penguin Logistics.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You're saying you were like me? You wanted to run away from your past?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Run away from it? No.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I was just tired of it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Same as you're tired of being held back by all those rules.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But you're so strong.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: My sword can't solve everything.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: After hearing you say all that, I know we should've found each other a long time ago.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You could have encouraged me...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And I could have encouraged you.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It's not too late.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Do you mean to say that we're friends now?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I don't have many friends, so I'm not really sure.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Now that you mention it, I don't have many people around me that I can call friends either.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But, we've already shared a bit of our past with each other. Usually, only friends talk about that stuff, right?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: True...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Then that settles it. We are friends!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You can call me Sora.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Okay, Sora.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Texas, where you at?!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: (Whisper) I'll make myself scarce.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: (Whisper) It's fine.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm at the office.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Don't you got deliveries to make?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Something came up, so no.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: (Whisper) Should you really be that blunt?!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Aight. Word of the day is 'mystery' n' all.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: That's a mysterious answer, so we good!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Oh, right, almost forgot the important thing.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: (Whisper) I'm not the 'important thing'?!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What'choo doin' right now?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: About to deliver an order.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Scratch that. Our keyboard player just had a bad breakup n' vanished. You're on the keyboard!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Usual place?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You know it.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Gotta go.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You rest here.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: If you want to leave, that's fine too. Just make sure to pull the door down from the outside. Thanks.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Can I go with you?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Are you afraid of the dark? I'll turn on a light for you.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'm the one who caused all this trouble. I should go tell Emperor, personally.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That works.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Boss, I'm here.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yeah, just in time.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Mr. Emperor, sir....
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Texas, when you said 'something came up', was you talkin' about this shawty?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: She didn't want to go, so I didn't take her.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh, aight.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: That's it? Just 'aight'?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What? Decided you wanna go now?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Then you don't go. I'll handle Monster Siren Records.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Thank you... Mr. Emperor.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Cool. Texas, go get ready. I'mma 'bout to take the stage.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Texas, you can play an instrument?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yeah. Boss forced me to learn a few.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: He's always saying a good Messenger has to play a musical instrument, so I did.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Personally, I like the cello.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Haha! I'd love to see you play the cello.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Next time maybe.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Hey, can I ask you how you left? Columbia, I mean.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Did you do what I did and just leave everything behind, all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I started a fire, ki... fought some people, and told everyone to stay away from me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Will they listen?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: They will. They know who I am, so they won't come looking for me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Although, it seems one of them still hasn't given up yet.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Well, did you do it?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Do what?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Did you really escape your past?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Since I left, I've only been certain about one thing—
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: One day, my past will catch up to me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Because I grew up in that world.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The ties I have with it can't be severed by any sword.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: It's like rainwater flowing into the drain, then the river. But eventually, it evaporates and becomes rain again.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: You mean running away is pointless?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: No. It got me to Lungmen, to your songs. It made us friends.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: And I've come to realize that delivering packages isn't nearly as easy as I thought.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: So when your past does catch up to you, what will you do then?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'll cross that bridge when I come to it.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: That's all?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yeah. That's all.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Pfft!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Nothing. It's just that... I feel like so many of my problems suddenly melted away.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You ready, Texas?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Aight...
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Emperor, I took a look at the set list. Can I join you for the next one, please?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh? You wanna try one of my legendary tracks for yourself?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You may not know, but I've been practicing my rapping. I've perfected my flow.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It's just that the label never gives me a chance to rap.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Naw, I know.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Our recording studios are pretty damned close, c'mon.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: So... what do you think of my rapping?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I think I can take this song, and this stage, and hand 'em right off to you.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Thanks!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I only got one condition.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Bring the house down, right?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Leave it to me!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hey! Shouldn't Emperor be on vocals? What's that girl doing onstage?
attributes.name: Audience Member A

attributes.content: She looks familiar. Wait, it's Sora, from Monster Siren Records!
attributes.name: Audience Member B

attributes.content: What's she doing here? Can she even rap?
attributes.name: Audience Member C

attributes.content: Everyone is so surprised.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'm even more surprised you can do one of boss's songs.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm a professional, I'll have you know.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: And also...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I've changed my mind, Texas.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: After I finish this one, can you take me to the concert hall?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I should still be able to make it.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Are you sure?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Yeah, I'm sure.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hello everyone. Today I will be performing an Emperor classic.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Some of you may know me, and some of you may not. It's fine either way.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Just remember to get on your feet and make some noise!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Because tonight, we're tearing the roof down!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Alright. This is far enough.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: From here on, I'll go it alone.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You don't need my help?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: This is my business, and I'll handle it.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Thank you, Texas.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You already thanked me.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: One thank you is not enough.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You saved my life; you listened to me. Plus, you told me—
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That even if I'm going to leave, I should tell everyone what kind of person I am.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Now that I think about it, if I just up and left, everyone would just think of me as 'that teen idol.' That's not the legacy I want for myself.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I just never had the courage to face up to it before.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Now I do.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Okay, I'm going now.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: If you run into any trouble, just give me a call.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Of course!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Damn, she leaves one helluva impression.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I'm thinkin' her path to true stardom starts right here.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Boss, you chose 'mystery' as the word of the day because you never intended to complete the Monster Siren Records job, right?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: From where I'm standin', looks to me like we got the job done?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: If this is what counts as done, I think our clients aren't going to be too happy.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Alright. I've solved today's 'mystery'. You're the one who called in the job.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Naw, you got this all twisted, Texas.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Sora's deep yearnin' for freedom put out the job.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Now, think about it, you know what the real job is, don't you?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Yeah, I do.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Monster Siren Records wanted us to 'deliver Sora to the stage.'
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But the job I was assigned was...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: To 'deliver the true Sora to the stage.'
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: The concert that night would later be immortalized by Sora's fans.
Sora, the idol, steps onto the stage and completely changes her style. She sings a variety of songs that clash with her usual image, ranging from folk to rap, and everything in between.
The band initially thinks this is a surprise sanctioned by the record company, so they play along with Sora for several songs.
Soon, the record company intervenes and tells them to stop, but Sora continues singing acapella.
'That was the most passionate voice I've ever heard on this great land.'
'What I heard was endless love, for music, for us, for freedom!'
—Commentary from one of the audience members.
However, after the performance, Monster Siren Records immediately blames Sora for the 'incident'. They threaten to terminate her for 'deliberately sabotaging' the show.
Despite mounting criticism, the usually meek Sora fights back with an unexpected toughness.
She refuses to apologize or admit her mistakes, putting both sides at a temporary impasse.
At this point, Emperor, renowned musician and also a producer signed to Monster Siren Records, steps in.
He states that his company, Penguin Logistics, will take Sora in until she can resume public life.
The Emperor's guarantee quickly smooths things over. For the time being, Sora decides to join Penguin Logistics as a Messenger.
Hmm... hmmhmm...♫
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hey, Texas, have you heard my new song yet?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yeah. It's pretty good.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: That's all you have to say about it?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I'd like some more detailed feedback, please.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Let me listen to it a few more times.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: We got a new job. Which one of you's takin'?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Me! I'll go!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Aight, you got this one, Sora.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Don't you go doing what you did last time, singin' for your fans n' forgettin' the job.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Don't worry, I won't!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Boss, after I deliver this one, can I go record another song?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Aight.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Thanks, boss!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Keep an eye on 'er, Texas.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Heh, put those two together, and it's gonna be straight fire.
attributes.name: Emperor
